scholarshipDetail: The Pro-Chancellor Scholarship is awarded to continuing students who have completed A-Level program in City University and are now pursuing a Degree program in City University. Up to 100% fee waiver for 1st year tuition fee Degree.

course: City U Scholarship for outstanding student
scholarshipDetail: Up to 80% tuition fee waiver for 1st year and for subsequent semesters in City University. This scholarship awarded to existing City University students who have consistently shown outstanding results in their degree and contribute toward the community and City University.

Up to 100% tuition fee waiver for subsequent semesters in City University. These programs have been developed in consultation with the industry to ensure that graduates are prepared and competent for work requirements.

Up to 100% tuition fee waiver for the minimum candidature period of the program. Other fees are payable in full. This Scholarship is offered to suitable applicants who are enrolling in postgraduate research program in City University.

Up to 100% tuition fee waiver for 1st year tuition fee Degree. This Scholarship is awarded to continuing students who have completed Foundation program in City University and are pursuing a Degree program in City University.

awarded to candidates who have outstanding sports achievement at the State and National levels or have demonstrated outstanding leadership quality through active participation in co-curricular activities, social services and volunteerism or have demonstrated strong entrepreneurial spirit in competition or start-ups.
